title: Manufacturers of Fine Gold & Silver Jewelry
subtitle: Your trusted manufacturing partner in Asia Reliably delivering quality craftsmanship around the world for over 30 years
AboutText: We are a family run business with over 30 years experience in the jewelry manufacturing industry. We produce over 3 million pieces of jewelry per year. We offer all jewelry categories including earrings, pendants, necklaces, bracelets, rings, chains and hoops. We work with 8k, 9k, 10k, 14k & 18k gold, 925 sterling silver as well as brass metal. Stones used include precious and semi-precious gemstones, natural and lab-grown diamonds, cubic zirconia and crystals. We also offer recycled metals, conflict-free gemstones and biodegradable packaging.
HomeAboutImg: Exterior view of Advance jewelry manufacturers Bangkok building where ethical jewelry is crafted with responsible sourcing standards
galleryText: An array of designs to choose from!
secretText: We engage over 400 highly qualified employees with over 3 decades of experience in jewelry production. Honesty, fairness and loyalty are deeply rooted in our corporate culture and this is the driving force in all our dealings with our customers, suppliers and employees. A large part of our workforce has been with us for over 30 years. This is one of the most important factors contributing to our success. This also helps maintain the high-quality standards that we are well known for.

HomeProcess.title: Our Design
HomeProcess.textCardOne: Our expert design team works closely with you to understand your vision and requirements
HomeProcess.textCardTwo: Using state-of-the-art CAD technology, we create precise 3D models of your designs
HomeProcess.textCardThree: We produce high-quality samples for your approval before mass production
HomeProcess.imgAltOne: Professional jewelry designers working together on custom jewelry designs at a modern workstation
HomeProcess.imgAltTwo: 3D CAD rendering of a detailed jewelry piece showing intricate design elements
HomeProcess.imgAltThree: High-quality jewelry sample being carefully inspected for quality assurance
